issue.title: [R] Bindings for GetRuntimeInfo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11507](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11507). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11427 added a RuntimeInfo struct that contains two strings: "simd_level" and "detected_simd_level" https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/config.h#L48-L70

We should query these and include them in the arrow_info() result.
